notes: HTML provides the structure of web pages
CSS controls the visual presentation and layout
JavaScript adds interactivity and dynamic behavior
Responsive design ensures websites work on all devices

flashcards.front: Which CSS property controls text color?
What is the purpose of JavaScript?
flashcards.back: To make web pages interactive and dynamic

quiz.q: Which tag is used to create a hyperlink?
quiz.explain: The <a> tag with href attribute creates hyperlinks
CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets

quiz.q: Which symbol is used for single-line comments in JavaScript?
quiz.explain: // is used for single-line comments in JavaScript
